title: Microsoft’s AI Red Team Has Already Made the Case for Itself
description: Since 2018, a dedicated team within Microsoft has attacked machine learning systems to make them safer. But with the public release of new generative AI tools, the field is already evolving.

title: AI Can Give You an NPC That Remembers. It Could Also Get Your Favorite Artist Fired
description: As game developers wrestle with the challenges and opportunities of incorporating AI tools across the industry, those same tools continue to increase in complexity.
